DOC.brief_summary: Liprotamase powder non-porcine , soluble stable mixture biotechnology-derived lipase , protease , amylase digestive enzyme . The purpose present study evaluate non-inferiority liprotamase compare porcine-derived , enterically-coated pancreatic enzyme replacement therapy ( PERT ) . The primary efficacy endpoint study comparative efficacy measure change baseline coefficient fat absorption ( CFA ) Cystic Fibrosis patient exocrine pancreatic insufficiency ( EPI ) .
DOC.brief_title: RESULT : Reliable , Emergent Solution Using Liprotamase Treatment
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Cystic Fibrosis base presentation , genotype and/or sweat chloride Fecal elastase < 100 mcg/g stool Good disease control porcine PERT prior enrollment Good nutritional status History diagnosis fibrosing colonopathy Distal intestinal obstruction syndrome 6 month prior screen Receiving enteral tube feeding Chronic diarrheal illness unrelated pancreatic insufficiency Liver abnormality , liver lung transplant , significant bowel resection Forced expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) < 30 %
